thread.section_title: Chinese Laundry Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chinese Laundry | www.chineselaundry.com | 2 of 24
thread.title: Monica

author: Monica
title: Monica
text: I placed an order back in August 2016; the order was completed and I returned an item (the return was processed). I got a notification in February 2017 that the same order was being shipped to me. I reached out to Chinese Laundry several times by phone, and also sent an email asking for clarification on the duplicate order that was never placed and was sent 6 months after the actual order was placed, and never heard anything back.
